flawed_nl_solution:
Matt spent on math and science 30% + 40% = 40% of the time.
This means he did homework from these two subjects for 2/5 * 150 minutes = <<2/5*150=60>>60 minutes.
So Matt spent 150 minutes - 60 minutes = <<150-60=90>>90 minutes doing homework from other subjects.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
